snippet: Forward Wayne Simmonds, who had career highs of 28 goals and 49 points in his first season with the Philadelphia Flyers, received a six-year extension.
lead_paragraph: Forward Wayne Simmonds, who had career highs of 28 goals and 49 points in his first season with the Philadelphia Flyers, received a six-year extension.

headline.seo: Flyers Give Wayne Simmonds a Six-Year Extension
headline.main: Flyers Give Simmonds a Six-Year Extension
headline.print_headline: Flyers Give Simmonds A Six-Year Extension
